reservations.name: Hampton Inn Manhattan
reservations.description: A centrally located hotel with comfortable rooms and free breakfast.

transportation.name: Delta Airlines Flight
transportation.description: Round trip flight from Gainesville to New York.

vacation.climate: May in New York is usually mild with average temperatures ranging from 55°F to 75°F.

day1.day_description: Arrival in New York and exploring Times Square.

activities.title: Shake Shack
activities.description: Famous for its burgers and milkshakes.

activities.title: Visit Times Square
activities.description: Explore the vibrant heart of the city with bright billboards and entertainment.

day2.day_description: Visit the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.

activities.title: Liberty Island Cafe
activities.description: Convenient cafe for light meals and snacks on Liberty Island.

activities.title: Statue of Liberty Tour
activities.description: Take a ferry to Liberty Island and tour the Statue.

day3.day_description: Explore Central Park and visit nearby museums.

activities.title: The Loeb Boathouse
activities.description: Charming lakeside restaurant offering a full menu.

activities.title: Central Park Walking Tour
activities.description: Guided tour showcasing the history and highlights of Central Park.

day4.day_description: Visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art and enjoy dinner at a local restaurant.

activities.title: Café Sabarsky
activities.description: A Viennese café in the Met offering pastries and coffee.

activities.title: Visit The Met
activities.description: Explore the extensive art collections at the Metropolitan Museum.

day5.day_description: Last day in New York, shopping and return flight.

activities.title: Eataly NYC Flatiron
activities.description: An Italian marketplace with restaurants, cafés, and a high-quality grocery.

activities.title: Shopping on Fifth Avenue
activities.description: Enjoy shopping at iconic stores along Fifth Avenue.
